tasks.title: Analyze Elementor JavaScript Codebase Structure
tasks.description: Deep analysis of Elementor's original JavaScript codebase to map file structure, module organization, and API patterns
tasks.details: Research the original Elementor plugin structure in core/assets/dev-js/, core/app/, and related directories. Document current vs target file organization, identify missing modules, and create detailed mapping between existing types and original implementations.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate mapping against actual Elementor plugin files and ensure comprehensive coverage of all modules

tasks.title: Create Common/Core Module Foundation
tasks.description: Restructure common utilities, base classes, and configuration interfaces to match Elementor's core structure
tasks.details: Create src/common/ directory with utils/, helpers/, and config/ subdirectories. Implement device detection utilities, DOM manipulation helpers, environment detection, global configuration interfaces, and shared type guards that mirror Elementor's common utilities.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate utilities match original Elementor implementations and provide comprehensive type coverage

tasks.title: Restructure Frontend Handler System
tasks.description: Align frontend handlers with original Elementor structure and implement element-specific handlers
tasks.details: Reorganize src/frontend/handlers/ to match Elementor's handler structure. Implement base handler classes and element-specific handlers (Button, Heading, Image, Video, etc.) with proper inheritance, lifecycle methods, event binding, and settings processing that mirrors the original implementations.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate handler hierarchy and methods match original Elementor frontend handlers

tasks.title: Restructure Editor Control System
tasks.description: Comprehensively restructure the editor control system to match original Elementor control architecture
tasks.details: Reorganize src/editor/controls/ to mirror Elementor's control structure. Implement base control classes (BaseControl, BaseData, BaseMultiple, BaseUnits), all control types (Color, Typography, Dimensions, Media, etc.), control registration and factory system, control views and behaviors, and validation systems that match the original implementations exactly.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate all control types and their inheritance hierarchy match original Elementor editor controls

subtasks.title: Create base control classes
subtasks.description: Implement base control classes: BaseControl, BaseData, BaseMultiple, BaseUnits
subtasks.details: Create src/editor/controls/base/, base-data/, base-multiple/, base-units/ matching the original Elementor control base classes with proper inheritance and lifecycle methods

subtasks.title: Implement simple control types
subtasks.description: Create simple control types: Hidden, Button, Notice, Tab, Section
subtasks.details: Implement controls that don't require complex data handling: hidden.ts, button.ts, notice.ts, tab.ts, section.ts

subtasks.title: Implement input control types
subtasks.description: Create input control types: Number, Select, Select2, Switcher, Choose, Code, Wysiwyg
subtasks.details: Implement text input and selection controls with proper value handling and validation

subtasks.title: Implement visual control types
subtasks.description: Create visual control types: Color, Icon, Icons, Media, Gallery, ImageDimensions
subtasks.details: Implement controls for visual elements including color pickers, icon selectors, media library integration, and gallery management

subtasks.title: Implement layout control types
subtasks.description: Create layout control types: Dimensions, Slider, Gaps, BoxShadow, Structure
subtasks.details: Implement controls for layout management including dimensions with units, slider ranges, spacing gaps, box shadow configuration, and structural layout options

subtasks.title: Implement advanced control types
subtasks.description: Create advanced control types: Repeater, RepeaterRow, PopoverToggle, DateTime, Font, URL, WPWidget, VisualChoice
subtasks.details: Implement complex controls including repeater fields with dynamic rows, popover toggles, date/time pickers, font selection, URL inputs with link options, WordPress widget integration, and visual choice selectors

tasks.title: Restructure Editor Element System
tasks.description: Align editor element system with original Elementor element architecture
tasks.details: Reorganize src/editor/elements/ to match Elementor's element structure. Implement base element classes, element types (Widget, Section, Column, Container), element models and collections, element views and rendering system, settings processing and inheritance that mirrors the original element system architecture.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate element hierarchy, models, and views match original Elementor element system

subtasks.title: Create element base classes
subtasks.description: Implement element base classes and manager
subtasks.details: Create src/editor/elements/manager.ts and base element classes including ElementBase, Widget, Section, Column with proper model/view/collection patterns

subtasks.title: Implement element models
subtasks.description: Create element model classes with data binding
subtasks.details: Implement BaseElementModel, WidgetModel, SectionModel, ColumnModel with Backbone.Model inheritance, settings management, and change tracking

subtasks.title: Implement element views
subtasks.description: Create element view classes with rendering and event handling
subtasks.details: Implement BaseElementView, WidgetView, SectionView, ColumnView with Marionette.View patterns, template rendering, and DOM event management

subtasks.title: Create element collections
subtasks.details: Create ElementsCollection, WidgetsCollection, SectionsCollection with Backbone.Collection patterns for managing multiple elements

tasks.title: Restructure Editor UI Components
tasks.description: Align editor UI components with original Elementor component structure
tasks.details: Reorganize src/editor/components/ to match Elementor's UI component structure. Implement panel system (left panel, right panel, etc.), navigator and structure view, history and undo/redo system, template library integration, dynamic content system, and all other UI components that mirror the original editor interface.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate UI component interfaces match original Elementor editor components

tasks.title: Restructure Admin Interface System
tasks.description: Align admin interface types with original Elementor admin structure
tasks.details: Reorganize src/admin/ to match Elementor's admin interface structure. Implement admin modules, admin utilities and helpers, admin configuration interfaces, and all admin-specific functionality that mirrors the original WordPress admin integration.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate admin interfaces match original Elementor admin functionality

tasks.title: Restructure App System (Kit Library)
tasks.description: Align app-specific types with original Elementor app system structure
tasks.details: Create src/app/ to match Elementor's app system structure. Implement app modules, app utilities and helpers, Kit Library system, template management, and all app-specific functionality that mirrors the original Elementor app architecture.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate app system interfaces match original Elementor app functionality

tasks.title: Update Main Index and Namespace Exports
tasks.description: Restructure main index.ts and namespace organization to match new architecture
tasks.details: Update src/index.ts to properly export from the new module structure. Ensure namespace organization mirrors Elementor's module organization. Maintain backward compatibility with existing exports while providing clean new structure. Update all import/export relationships to match the original codebase dependencies.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate all exports work correctly and maintain backward compatibility

tasks.title: Cross-Reference and Validation
tasks.description: Comprehensive cross-referencing of all types with original Elementor implementations
tasks.details: Validate all module dependencies and imports match original codebase. Ensure comprehensive coverage of all public APIs. Cross-reference every interface and class with actual Elementor JavaScript implementations. Verify 99% API coverage and structural alignment with original codebase.
tasks.testStrategy: Comprehensive testing against actual Elementor plugin files and API validation

tasks.title: Final Integration and Compatibility Testing
tasks.description: Final integration testing and backward compatibility validation
tasks.details: Comprehensive TypeScript compilation testing, consumer testing with existing projects using the types, integration testing with actual Elementor JavaScript code, performance testing to verify no impact from type changes, and final validation of zero breaking changes for existing consumers.
tasks.testStrategy: Full regression testing and compatibility validation with existing type consumers

metadata.description: Comprehensive TypeScript coverage improvement tasks based on detailed analysis - expanded from 15 to 28 tasks covering critical gaps in Core, Frontend, Editor, and Utility systems. Major progress: 9/28 tasks completed including all critical foundation tasks.
